name: unlabelled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
of an object, not having a piece of paper, etc., attached to give you information about it, or not having information written on it: Coeliacs need to be very careful when buying unlabelled food. He keeps the tablets in an unlabelled bottle. Related word
labelled
More examplesFewer examplesAll the moving boxes were unlabelled, so we had to open them one by one.The investigation found that many genetically modified foods were unlabelled, contrary to legislation.Some of the old video tapes had writing on them, but most were unlabelled.
